trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Fayetteville
There were no other sightings in Fayetteville on or around January 7th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsgot up to get my child ready for school. went outside to smoke, it was very windy, i was looking at the fast moving clouds. i noticed what i thought was a star at first, but , it was too bright to be a star. i thought it could be a plane, but, it didnt make any noise, and, it was moving extremely slow. so slow, i thought it was stationary at first. it was moving against the wind. it kept floating by, until, the tree line and clouds, obstructed my view of it. i said to myself, "that was freaky." i wanted to get my camera, but, didnt think id have time to.
